title: Tom Hardy and Charlotte Riley reportedly welcome their first child together - Showbiz
text: Tom Hardy has reportedly become a father for the second time, welcoming his first baby with wife Charlotte Riley.A heavily-pregnant Riley joined Hardy on the red carpet at the premiere of his movie Legend, and now MailOnline reports that the couple have welcomed their new arrival. Â© Rex Features Digital Spy has reached out to Hardy's representative for confirmation of the report.The couple got married in July 2014, holding a small private ceremony in southern France.They met on the set of ITV's Wuthering Heights in 2009, where they were cast as Emily Bronte's iconic lovers Heathcliff and Cathy, and got engaged the following year.Hardy is father to a son named Louis from a previous relationship.He will next be seen in the Oscar-tipped The Revenant, starring alongside Leonardo DiCaprio, Will Poulter and Domhnall Gleeson.
